item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi my name is Leon and I’m currently studying computer science at the Christian-Albrechts-University in Kiel, Germany. I have a strong preference for coding in Python and I am mainly interested in data analysis and prototyping. Since my early childhood I am fascinated by computers and how they work. So it comes to no surprise that my best friend and me got to ‘modify’ video games when we were still in fifth grade.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Inventory management System I build a fully operational inventory management system for my former employer. Written in Python using Flask it supports eight distributed shops in managing: replacement parts rental smartphones orders customer data Papershift Integration for Slack Because we were using Slack for general communication and Papershift to organize work schedules quite extensivly I wrote a handy bot that could tell us about scheduled work schifts.
